languages.text: {n}Все тело Соломона напрягается, и Глейто тут же подается вперед, ища невидимую угрозу, но железная рука тянет ошейник на себя.{/n} "Я вспоминал лицо этого ублюдка, и душил в себе постыдное желание смерти снова и снова. Часы в агонии, часы в омуте чистой ярости".

{n}Solomorne's entire body tenses, and Glaito immediately leans forward, looking for the unseen threat, but his master's iron hand tugs at his collar.{/n} "I kept recalling that bastard's face, and smothered any base thoughts I had about welcoming death again and again. Hours of agony. Hours in the whirlpool of pure rage."
languages.original_text: {n}Все тело Соломона напрягается, и Глейто тут же подается вперед, ища невидимую угрозу, но железная рука тянет ошейник на себя.{/n} "Я вспоминал лицо этого ублюдка, и душил в себе постыдное желание смерти снова и снова. Часы в агонии, часы в омуте чистой ярости".

Hours of agony, hours in the whirlpool of pure rage."

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンの全身が緊張し、それに呼応するようにグライトも身を乗り出して見えない脅威を探ろうとするが、主の鉄の手が首輪を引いて制する。{/n}「ひたすら、あの裏切り者の顔を思い浮かべ、何度も何度も死を望みかけた卑しい考えを押し殺しました。苦痛の時間…そして、純粋な怒りの渦に呑まれた時間でした」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's entire body tenses, and Glaito immediately leans forward, looking for the unseen threat, but his master's iron hand tugs at his collar.{/n} "I kept recalling that bastard's face, and smothered any base thoughts I had about welcoming death again and again. Hours of agony. Hours in the whirlpool of pure rage."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンの全身が緊張し、それに呼応するようにグライトも身を乗り出して見えない脅威を探ろうとするが、主の鉄の手が首輪を引いて制する。{/n}「ひたすら、あの裏切り者の顔を思い浮かべ、何度も何度も死を望みかけた卑しい考えを押し殺しました。苦痛の時間…そして、純粋な怒りの渦に呑まれた時間でした」

languages.text: {n}Solomornes ganzer Körper versteift sich, und Glaito beugt sich sofort vor und sucht nach der unsichtbaren Bedrohung, aber die Eisenhand seines Herren hält ihn am Halsband zurück.{/n} "Ich habe mir immer wieder das Gesicht dieses Mistkerls vorgestellt und jeden Gedanken an einen willkommenen Tod unterdrückt. Stunden voller Agonie. Stunden im Strudel puren Zorns."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's entire body tenses, and Glaito immediately leans forward, looking for the unseen threat, but his master's iron hand tugs at his collar.{/n} "I kept recalling that bastard's face, and smothered any base thoughts I had about welcoming death again and again. Hours of agony. Hours in the whirlpool of pure rage."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomornes ganzer Körper versteift sich, und Glaito beugt sich sofort vor und sucht nach der unsichtbaren Bedrohung, aber die Eisenhand seines Herren hält ihn am Halsband zurück.{/n} "Ich habe mir immer wieder das Gesicht dieses Mistkerls vorgestellt und jeden Gedanken an einen willkommenen Tod unterdrückt. Stunden voller Agonie. Stunden im Strudel puren Zorns."

languages.text: {n}Le corps de Solomorne se raidit et Glaito se redresse immédiatement, à l'affût d'une menace invisible, mais son maître referme sa main de fer sur son collier.{/n} « Je me suis concentré sur le visage de ce bâtard en tentant d'éviter de penser à la mort qui me libérerait de mes souffrances. Des heures d'agonie. Des heures à attiser ma rage. »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's entire body tenses, and Glaito immediately leans forward, looking for the unseen threat, but his master's iron hand tugs at his collar.{/n} "I kept recalling that bastard's face, and smothered any base thoughts I had about welcoming death again and again. Hours of agony. Hours in the whirlpool of pure rage."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le corps de Solomorne se raidit et Glaito se redresse immédiatement, à l'affût d'une menace invisible, mais son maître referme sa main de fer sur son collier.{/n} « Je me suis concentré sur le visage de ce bâtard en tentant d'éviter de penser à la mort qui me libérerait de mes souffrances. Des heures d'agonie. Des heures à attiser ma rage. »

languages.text: {n}El cuerpo entero de Solomorne se tensa, y Glaito se echa inmediatamente hacia delante buscando la amenaza invisible, pero la mano de hierro de su amo lo sujeta del collar.{/n} «No podía quitarme de la cabeza la cara de aquel bastardo, y reprimí una y otra vez las ganas de rendirme a la liberación de la muerte. Fueron horas de agonía. Horas en un torbellino de pura rabia».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's entire body tenses, and Glaito immediately leans forward, looking for the unseen threat, but his master's iron hand tugs at his collar.{/n} "I kept recalling that bastard's face, and smothered any base thoughts I had about welcoming death again and again. Hours of agony. Hours in the whirlpool of pure rage."

traits.locale_text: {n}El cuerpo entero de Solomorne se tensa, y Glaito se echa inmediatamente hacia delante buscando la amenaza invisible, pero la mano de hierro de su amo lo sujeta del collar.{/n} «No podía quitarme de la cabeza la cara de aquel bastardo, y reprimí una y otra vez las ganas de rendirme a la liberación de la muerte. Fueron horas de agonía. Horas en un torbellino de pura rabia».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙整个身体都绷紧了。格雷托见状，立刻向前倾着身体，搜寻着看不见的威胁，但索罗蒙将铁手放在了格雷托的项圈上。{/n}“我不断地回想着那个人渣的脸，一次次压制住了渴望解脱的想法。我不知承受了多久的痛苦，也不知在纯粹的怒火之中沉浸了多久。”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's entire body tenses, and Glaito immediately leans forward, looking for the unseen threat, but his master's iron hand tugs at his collar.{/n} "I kept recalling that bastard's face, and smothered any base thoughts I had about welcoming death again and again. Hours of agony. Hours in the whirlpool of pure rage."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙整个身体都绷紧了。格雷托见状，立刻向前倾着身体，搜寻着看不见的威胁，但索罗蒙将铁手放在了格雷托的项圈上。{/n}“我不断地回想着那个人渣的脸，一次次压制住了渴望解脱的想法。我不知承受了多久的痛苦，也不知在纯粹的怒火之中沉浸了多久。”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne'un tüm bedeni geriliyor. Glaito öne doğru eğilerek görünmeyen tehdidi arasa da efendisinin demir eli, tasmasını çekiyor.{/n} "O alçağın suratı gözümün önünden gitmiyordu. Ölümü kucaklamaya yönelik tüm aşağılık düşüncelerimi tekrar tekrar bastırdım. Saatlerce ızdırap çektim. Saf öfke girdabında saatler geçirdim."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's entire body tenses, and Glaito immediately leans forward, looking for the unseen threat, but his master's iron hand tugs at his collar.{/n} "I kept recalling that bastard's face, and smothered any base thoughts I had about welcoming death again and again. Hours of agony. Hours in the whirlpool of pure rage."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne'un tüm bedeni geriliyor ve Glaito, öne doğru eğilerek görünmeyen tehdidi arıyor ama efendisinin demir eli tasmasını çekiyor.{/n} "O alçağın suratı gözümün önünden gitmiyordu. Ölümü kucaklamaya yönelik tüm aşağılık düşüncelerimi tekrar tekrar bastırdım. Saatler süren ızdırap. Saf öfke girdabında geçen saatler."

languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's entire body tenses, and Glaito immediately leans forward, looking for the unseen threat, but his master's iron hand tugs at his collar.{/n} "I kept recalling that bastard's face, and smothered any base thoughts I had about welcoming death again and again. Hours of agony. Hours in the whirlpool of pure rage."
